attributes.action: stop the proposed introduction of  compulsory close ringing for all captive bred birds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The EU bureaucrats are proposing to introduce a regulation that requires every breeder of captive bred birds to close ring their chicks.
whilst close ringing is feasible for many species with some species such as the smaller wax bills and finches it is not a practical proposition owing to the high risk of parent birds abandoning their nests due to  interference / nest disturbance.
if compulsory close ringing of captive bred birds becomes law then many species will be lost in aviculture for ever.
